item.title: Azure CLI
item.description: Requirements Azure CLI gum Azure CLII prefer the PowerShell module, but the azure CLI is pretty solid for those times when something with .NET just won’t cooperate… Storage for State FilesI found the need to create storage buckets pretty important if running pulumi or terraform. Makes sense to do this via the CLI for basic usage as it’s a chicken or the egg problem. Start with az login. InputsThis assumes you’ll place the storage account in an existing resource group.
